name: I Heart Watches
overview:
We are a very small company focused on providing an online community for wristwatch enthusiasts.

The value for these enthusiasts is that they will receive authentic, unparalleled reviews of the most popular watches in the world and can make a better purchasing decision based on this vital information.

Our site will offer hundreds of real world photos, videos, and useful summary articles to allow our users to experience watches they normally wouldn’t be able to unless they went to a store and tried it on themsevles- however, this site provides so much more information and user feedback than a typical jeweler or watch store would.
